thread.title: Astronaut John Young, Who Walked on the Moon, Dies at 87

author: wsjcom
title: Astronaut John Young, Who Walked on the Moon, Dies at 87
text:
Legendary astronaut John Young, who walked on the moon and later commanded the first space shuttle flight, has died, according to a statement from NASA. He was 87 years old.
The space agency said Mr. Young died Friday night at home in Houston following complications from pneumonia.
NASA called Mr. Young one of its pioneersâ€”the only agency...
